wikipedia_page.main: Huw van Steenis (born 25 September 1969) is a British banker and currently Senior Adviser to the CEO at UBS. He also chairs UBS´ Sustainable Finance Committee. He formerly served as Senior Adviser to Mark Carney, the Governor of Bank of England where he led a review on the future of finance. Before, he was Global Head of Strategy at Schroders, a British multinational asset management company, and Global Coordinator Banks and Diversified Financials within the Equity Research Division at investment bank Morgan Stanley. He is noted for his bearish forecasts prior to the global financial crisis and Eurozone crisis, and views on the reshaping of the investment industry.

link_mentions.page: Camilla Cavendish, Baroness Cavendish of Little Venice
response: Cavendish is married to the financier Huw van Steenis, and they have three children.
*Huw van Steenis, Head of European Financials Services Research, Morgan Stanley
